name: Dziek's Christmas 2015 Tree Decoration Bonanza
description:
This is a game about decorating trees.

I exist here in case you want to wish me a Merry Christmas.

INSTRUCTIONS:

You see a tree, you make a tree

Be quick for more score

CONTROLS:

Player - 1/2

---

Up - W/I

Left - A/J

Right - D/L

Flip (when upside down) - S/K

Toggle magnets - Q/U

Attach decoration - E/O

Compare tree - Space
